ModMetaData.name: [JDS] The Forge - Exiled Dawn Armory
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
A Standalone Mod for Exiled Dawn just weapon and armor no more faction, unlockable, or the need of the Royalty DLC
[h1]Tips:[/h1] For colord armor. first you need to place down the flag pole and pick your color then craft the armor it will apply it, any armor that was made before the flag ploe don't get update to the newer color
[h1]Features:[/h1] -Added Faction called Exiled Dawn -Added Flagpole to color your own colony -Added FabricationWorkbench to craft armor and weapons -Added 6 Melee weapons -Added 6 Ranged weapons -Added 5 Headgears -Added 12 armor set
[url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1n9GRiwdPvO5aHe0DcIg1xC7rs9zhPdHuAB7ICUR6_fY/edit?usp=sharing] Exiled Dawn Armory Spreadsheet [/url]
[h1]Recommended Mods"[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1678847247] Graphics Settings - Fix your textures! [/url]
[h1]credits:[/h1] - Cpt.Ohu for the use of "FactionColors.dll" - Jecrell for the use of "CompOversizedWeapon.dll" - Inspired by kimplate for this person art called "[url=https://www.deviantart.com/kimplate/art/knight-on-duty-538981829] knight on duty [/url]"
